H0.text: Who co-starred with George Clooney in the 2013 movie Gravity. Sandra Bullock

H1.text: Who co-starred with George Clooney in the 2013 movie Gravity. Warner Bros.

H2.text: Who co-starred with George Clooney in the 2013 movie Gravity. Alfonso Cuarón

H3.text: Who co-starred with George Clooney in the 2013 movie Gravity. Fortis Films

A4.text: It stars Sandra Bullock and George Clooney as American astronauts who attempt to return to Earth after the destruction of their Space Shuttle in orbit.

A5.text: Gravity is a 2013 science fiction thriller film directed by Alfonso Cuarón, who also co-wrote, co-edited, and produced the film.
